thread.title: Billionaire CEO launches electric car with 'bioweapon defence mode' that saves you from 'apocalyptic scenarios'
thread.title_full: Billionaire CEO launches electric car with 'bioweapon defence mode' that saves you from 'apocalyptic scenarios' - Mirror Online

author: Jeff Parsons
title: Billionaire CEO launches electric car with 'bioweapon defence mode' that saves you from 'apocalyptic scenarios'
text:
With the ever-growing threat of a biological apocalypse , it's important to have a car that will get you around following the downfall of human civilization .
And billionaire CEO Elon Musk has just such a car .
At the launch event for Tesla's Model X yesterday, Musk pointed out the car has a button for entering 'bioweapon defence mode'.
YouTube Press this and you enter bioweapon defence mode
"If there's ever an apocalyptic scenario of some kind, you just press the bioweapon defence mode button," he announced at the car's launch.
"We're trying to be a leader in apocalyptic defence scenarios."
What the button actually does is pushes the car's in-built air filter up to such a level that, Musk says, not even bacterial spores can get in to hurt you.
Reuters A Tesla Model X electric sports-utility vehicle is displayed during a presentation in Fremont, California September 29, 2015
According to Tesla, the air filter is 10 times larger than that found in a regular car.
The company claims the Model X is 300 times better at filtering bacteria, 500 times better at filtering allergens, 700 times better at filtering smog, and 800 times better at filtering viruses.
Getty Tesla CEO Elon Musk speaks at the Model X launch event in Femont, California on September 29, 2015
Perhaps someone should let Volkswagon know .
